1.description: 10px equivalent - Extra-tight spacing for very compact layouts

2.description: 20px equivalent - Tight spacing for elements that need to be positioned closely together

3.description: 30px equivalent - Default spacing for most elements

4.description: 40px equivalent - Moderate spacing for elements that need a bit more breathing room

5.description: 50px equivalent - Large spacing for section breaks or more spacious elements

6.description: 60px equivalent - Extra-large spacing for especially prominent elements

7.description: 70px equivalent - Very large spacing for elements that need a lot of breathing room

8.description: 80px equivalent - Enormous spacing for elements that need to be extremely spaced apart

9.description: 90px equivalent - Huge spacing for massive section breaks or very spacious elements

10.description: 100px equivalent - Gigantic spacing for elements that need to be extremely spaced apart
